questions.question: What is the primary function of a miner in a blockchain network?
options: B) To add new blocks to the blockchain
C) To check for changes in the blockchain
D) To manage the network of nodes

questions.question: What is the benefit of having a decentralized record-keeping system?
What type of data is stored in a blockchain?
Why is it important to track assets and ownership on a blockchain?
What is the primary benefit of using a cryptographic algorithm in a blockchain?
Why is it important to have multiple nodes on the network?
What is the primary function of a web development best practice?
options: C) To increase security and trustworthiness

questions.question: Why is it important to use a secure connection (HTTPS) when transmitting data?
options: B) To prevent tampering with data

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of using a modular and scalable architecture in web development?
options: C) To improve maintainability and flexibility

questions.question: Why is it important to test for cross-browser compatibility in web development?
options: C) To enhance user experience across different browsers
